ygData.subject: RE: RE: That darn goblin alchemist.
ygData.msgSnippet: I got my Treant Fists a little more than 3 weeks ago. As I said, the alchemist and his place holders (including Mooto) in Misty are wanderers, and go to other
ygData.messageBody:
I got my Treant Fists a little more than 3 weeks ago.
As I said, the alchemist and his place holders (including Mooto) in Misty
are wanderers, and go to other camps, and the one you are talking about is
their first goal. You may have intercept them while they were wandering. But
I am sure that the spawns are every 20 minutes, and it is not only Mooto,
but also a warrior or a shaman so you may have missed some place holders.
I have never seen a place holder in the gorge outside the 72-85 min range.
You have to be very careful, because if people are fighting next to the
zone, it can be very difficult to see the exact spawns and when they are
killed.
Of course, everything I say is true if they have not changed anything about
the spawns. I have not read anything about it on the message boards, so I
think it is still true.

Tsin Suchiko
42nd rank, Tunare.



-----Original Message-----
From: imari_dellimore@... [mailto:imari_dellimore@...]
Sent: Thursday, February 17, 2000 11:13 AM
To: Guillaume Voizard; EQ-Monks@onelist.com
Subject: Re:RE: [EQ-Monks] That darn goblin alchemist.


From: imari_dellimore@...

Hmm Maybe they moved the spawn in Misty. When I got the alchemist there (
after
about 2 hours of camping) I was at the camp right next to the running eye
zone,
and the alchemist spawned right ontop of me. Also my experience there was
that
mooto spawned only every hour or so


I never moved to any of the otehr goblin camps.


As far as your info on the Gorge spawn goes. It conforms to my experience.
Only thing I would add is that the 72-80 minte spawn seems to have a much
wider
range than that - sometimes you wont get a double spawn for more than 2
hours.

I did the quest when I was levle 19, about 3 weeks ago. Maybe your info is
more
recent. i dont know.
